data.quoteText: I'm so excited for my first fragrance! I chose to partner with Dots because I love what they do for their customers, bringing them the hottest trends in fashion, accessories and fragrance at unbelievably low prices. It's amazing!
I was sleeping the other night, alone, thanks to the exterminator.
Self-reverence, self-knowledge, self-control these three alone lead one to sovereign power.

All species capable of grasping this fact manage better in the struggle for existence than those which rely upon their own strength alone: the wolf, which hunts in a pack, has a greater chance of survival than the lion, which hunts alone.
Down to Gehenna, or up to the Throne, He travels the fastest who travels alone.
To the press alone, chequered as it is with abuses, the world is indebted for all the triumphs which have been gained by reason and humanity over error and oppression.

I think I meant that, given the circumstances of my childhood, I had the illusion that it's easier to be alone. To have your relationships be casual and also to pose as a solitary person, because it was more romantic. You know, I was raised on the idea of the ramblin' man and the loner.
We gave up some of our country to the white men, thinking that then we could have peace. We were mistaken. The white man would not let us alone.
God created man and, finding him not sufficiently alone, gave him a companion to make him feel his solitude more keenly.
When thinking about companions gone, we feel ourselves doubly alone.
